products.name: Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Pore Clarifying
products.description: Banila Co’s cult-favorite oil cleanser transforms from a sherbet-like balm texture into a smooth oil when applied to skin. Developed to remove impurities, pollution and excess oil from the skin - even waterproof makeup! - in just one simple cleansing step. The Pore Clarifying variety is particularly great for oily and acne-prone skin or combination (oily) skin.

products.name: Carrot Deep Clear Remover Oil Pad
products.description: Oily skin types, this is your new holy grail! These embossed pads are soaked with oil for an easy, yet effective, cleanse. Skin will feel smoother and silky after use, getting excess oils and sebum on the skin’s surface under control. Carrot seed oil is rich in beta-carotene, an antioxidant-rich carotenoid which helps remove impurities. Moringa also helps to combat free radical damage and its high vitamin content helps to purify and protect skin. Gentle exfoliators poly hydroxy acid (PHA) and beta-lipohydroxy acid (LHA) remove dead skin cells from the surface and help improve skin texture. The oil emulsifies easily, and leaves no residue or stickiness - just smooth, soft skin.

products.name: Real Charcoal Pad
products.description: Purify and care for pores with these tightening, brightening essence oil pads from K-beauty innovator, Neogen! Bamboo charcoal absorbs toxins, excess sebum, oil and impurities from the skin’s surface while gently exfoliating to stimulate cell growth. Canadian glacial soil clay and Hungarian moor mud help to further absorb impurities and clarify skin, while anti-inflammatory peat water tightens pores. Patented ABS Ginger Mint Cooling Extract combines benefits from both ginger and mint to lower skin’s temperature to prevent pores from expanding, giving a smoother, tighter texture and appearance.

products.name: Glowing, Glowing, Gone Exclusive Set
products.description: A perfect gift for yourself or a loved one, pamper skin with a luxurious cleansing experience with the 12x award-winning Living Cleansing Balm. Then, create a natural “no-makeup makeup” look with EM Cosmetics’ Illustrative Eyeliner in Black Brush Tip and Lip Cushion in Magic Hour. A trio that’s a treat for both the senses and the skin!

products.name: Then I Met You The Complete Collection
products.description: A $232 Value! Are you ready to glow deeper? The Complete Collection includes the full Then I Met You™ assortment, a truly thoughtful line of premium products that help you reconnect with your skin care routine and provide noticeable results.

products.name: Minions Body Balancing Mask Set
products.description: Say “Bello!” to this special collaboration between Tony Moly X Minions! This is a three-piece balancing mask set featuring must-haves that will bring nourishment and hydration to combat dryness on hands, feet and hair.

products.name: Green Tangerine Vita C Serum
products.description: A fast favorite, this gel-like serum is packed with brightening and skin tone-evening benefits from 70% green tangerine extract, which is potent in natural vitamin C derivatives. Green tangerines contain up to 10x more vitamin C than their mature counterparts! They’re cold-pressed to ensure maximum nutrients are retained in the process. Vitamin C helps fade dark spots and hyperpigmentation.

products.name: Licorice pH Balancing Advance Serum
products.description: Exclusive to Soko Glam: Meet the newest member of the popular Licorice pH Balancing line from Acwell... the Licorice pH Balancing Advance Serum!

products.name: Green Tangerine Vita C Eye Gel Patch
products.description: Brighten, plump and firm the under eye area with potent vitamin C hydrogel eye patches. Hydrate in just 5 minutes with the fast-absorbing vitamin C-rich formula. Containing the same highly effective green tangerine extract as the cult-favorite serum, these eye patches deliver all the great brightening benefits of vitamin C to help alleviate dark circles and pigmentation around the eyes.

products.name: Super Aqua Cell Renew Snail Hydro Gel Mask
products.description: A hydro-gel facial mask infused with fermented snail mucin and gold extracts that hydrates, brightens, and repairs dry, dull skin. Snail mucin provides a visible boost to skin's elasticity, smoothing and tightening skin's appearance.

products.name: MEDIHEAL X LINE FRIENDS N.M.F Aquaring Ampoule Mask Set
products.description: Dry skin doesn’t stand a chance against this ultra-hydrating face mask set! Designed in collaboration with the popular Line Friends characters and formulated by Mediheal’s dermatologists and estheticians, it’s a perfect pairing.

products.name: MEDIHEAL X LINE FRIENDS Tea Tree Care Solution Essential Mask Set
products.description: This all-in-one calming mask keeps your skin looking on its best behavior. Designed in collaboration with the popular Line Friends characters and formulated by Mediheal’s dermatologists and estheticians, it’s a perfect pairing.

products.name: Moisture Boost Deep Sea Minis Set
products.description: Featuring Tony Moly favorites infused with skin-rejuvenating sea water, algae and hyaluronic acid, this ultra-hydrating set will cleanse, soothe and moisturize to provide skin the ultimate glow! This four-product set includes the Moisture Boost Gel To Water Cleanser (30 ml), Moisture Boost Cooling Algae Eye Serum (15ml), Moisture Boost Cooling Hydrogel Eye Patch (1 pair) & Heart-Shaped Cleansing Sponge (1 sponge).

products.name: Heaven’s Glow Radiant Veil Blush - Faded Clementine
products.description: Golden bronze hues mixed with rich tangerine pigment for a stunning pearlized effect to keep you glowing. This multi-functional powder can be used as a blush, bronzer or highlighter to provide multidimensional and seamless color. Formulated with an innovative blend of pearly pigments this delicate blush layers beautifully for a diffused golden glow. It has a three-dimensional quality that has a flattering blurring effect on the skin, while being an easily buildable formula that layers beautifully for sheer to medium color.

products.name: Illustrative Eyeliner
products.description: This precision tip eyeliner will help you achieve a perfectly lined lid with a crisp look. The Illustrative Eyeliner features a brush tip that’s designed with a fine, flexible tip with fast-drying liquid ink to allow complete control over creating thick to thin lines with ease. Comes in two shades - Brown Brush Tip and Black Brush Tip - to create and complement any makeup look you desire, whether it’s more natural or a bold style. Perfect even for beginners, this liquid eyeliner is waterproof, smudge-proof, and long-wearing.

products.name: Waterproof Brush Liner
products.description: A true makeup staple, made for anyone looking to achieve a thin, precise liner look! Formulated with advanced film-forming polymers to immediately adhere to skin for a long-lasting eye makeup look, this ultrafine liner creates defined lines with it’s brush tip without irritation. The Waterproof Brush Liner delivers intense, deep color for a truly defined makeup look.

products.name: Deep Green Tea Serum
products.description: Rebalance and revive dull, rough skin with this nourishing serum. Containing over 53% green tea extracts from BoSeong, the home of green tea farming in Korea, to gently address chapped, dehydrated and irritated skin with a calming cooling effect.

products.name: Clear (Skin) Days Ahead Starter Set
products.description: A $75+ value! Clearer (skin) days are ahead with this 5-piece starter set, curated especially for teens with acne-prone skin types. During this time, when skin is in a transition, it’s so important to care for it and use soothing, calming, and gentle ingredients that are still effective for acne. These products are meant to be used regularly, AM and PM, together with the spot treatments for pimples and cysts. You’ll see stronger, healthier and best of all, clearer skin!

products.name: Mama-To-Be Skin Care Starter Set
products.description: Charlotte's curated pregnancy and breastfeeding-safe skin care set for mamas-to-be! This starter set contains the four essential products new moms need to focus on as the body and skin goes through many changes during pregnancy, in particular: melasma/pigmentation, dryness, plus a growing bump, and ensuring skin is nourished and protected from head to toe!

products.name: Men's Daily Hydration Set
products.description: A $65+ value! Tailored to better suit the needs of men’s skin, these hydrating curations will keep skin clearer, smoother and moisturized on the daily. This 3-piece set (cleanser, essence and SPF) has your new dopp kit essentials to keep skin healthy!

products.name: Vinegar Kombucha Essence
products.description: Brighter, more vibrant skin awaits you after using this smoothing essence from clean skin care brand Juice To Cleanse. 95% fermented kombucha - steeped from black tea - rejuvenates dull skin and gently exfoliates to remove dead skin cells from the surface, revealing a brighter, softer complexion. Nature’s remedy, apple cider vinegar, additional helps to brighten and smooth while hyaluronic acid delivers moisture deeper. Natural PHA’s (mild acids) from fruits like pineapple and papaya further nourish and additionally exfoliate. Together, these ingredients prep and hydrate the skin to contribute to a healthy, radiant, glow-from-within look.

products.name: Urban Matte Clay
products.description: Create sculpted, touchable styles or smooth frizz and flyaways with this water-based styling clay. It is also a perfect hair product for men as this treatment was actually developed from grooming products. The emollient paste provides hold and control without making hair feel sticky or crunchy and easily rinses out without leaving behind any residue. The formula’s mild scent freshens up second and third-day hair.

products.name: All You Need Is Love Holiday Set
products.description: Discover the amazing skin care benefits of snail mucin in one special set! This multi-tasking powerhouse ingredient can help many different types of skin concerns and issues, particularly to help with anti-aging - from increasing cell turnover for a healthier, more youthful complexion to hydrating and softening the skin. Plus, it’s great and safe for all skin types!

products.name: Bathroom BFF Set
products.description: The Cleansing Balm and Foam Cleanser were formulated to work together to remove all traces of makeup, sunscreen, oil and dirt without drying or stripping the skin. This duo was created to gently cleanse and prep your skin for the next steps in your routine. First, use the oil-based cleansing balm by massaging into dry skin to remove oil-based impurities. Then, follow with the water-based foaming cleanser to clear away dirt and sweat, leaving your skin refreshed, smooth, and most importantly - clean.

products.name: Dear, Klairs Vitamin Duo Trial Kit
products.description: A favorite brightening serum on Soko Glam, the Freshly Juiced Vitamin Drop contains 5% Vitamin C (ascorbic acid) to even out the skin tone and brighten it, helping to fade scarring and pigmentation. It also pairs centella asiatica to calm, and peptides to plump. pH level of 3.5±1.

products.name: Egg Remedy Hair Pack
products.description: Dry, frizzy hair will be nourished and tamed with this protein-packed hair mask treatment. Restore strands to their smooth luster with a nutrient-rich combination of egg, butter and milk. Nourishing fatty acid-rich olive oil and avocado infuse moisture back into the hair shaft, while honey - a natural humectant - keeps hair hydrated and smooth. You’ll see smoother, more manageable hair immediately.

products.name: Egg Cream Mask Hydration Set (5 pack)
products.description: Revive dry, dull skin with these hydrating microfiber sheet masks. With protein-packed egg yolk and egg white extracts, this formula will help tighten pores and boost cell turnover due to it’s high amino acid content. Hydrating coconut water and brightening niacinamide round out the formula, to make this a perfect solution for skin that’s in need of a boost.

products.name: Egg Mellow Cream
products.description: This unique, creamy moisturizer is a hybrid, multi-tasking priming and hydrating superstar. Egg white and yolk extracts purify pores and firm the skin. Collagen fiber - flash-frozen to preserve its active ingredients - helps to improve skin elasticity and proteins and fatty acids are evenly distributed to keep skin nourished. Inca Omega Oil renews and strengthens the skin’s barrier, while ceramides soothe and niacinamide brightens.

products.name: Egg-zyme Whipped Foam
products.description: Deeply hydrate skin from the first step in your routine with this whipped foam cleanser. Egg yolk and egg white extracts purify and clear pores to help provide a clean canvas for the skin. Egg white (albumen) extract also includes lysozymes, which are antimicrobial and dissolve on the skin for a more effective protective cleanse. Hydrolyzed hyaluronic acid delivers hydration deeper into the skin, while centella asiatica and ceramide NP soothe and calm while improving the skin’s barrier function.

products.name: MadeCera Starter Kit
products.description: This starter set features mini-sized favorites from the best-selling, community-favorite SKINRx Lab MadeCera collection. Each product is formulated with calming madecassoside and soothing ceramides designed to help moisturize skin, improve and protect the skin barrier while bringing vitality to dull skin tone.

products.name: Radiant Cream Primer SPF 15
products.description: Get a subtle all-over glow with this smoothing, hydrating primer from IPKN. The formula is enriched with a blend of lemon, orange, pomegranate and grape extracts that nourish and revitalize skin and provide a hint of fragrance. Rose extract restores moisture and balances the pH levels of the skin, while shimmer pearl powder adds instant radiance to your complexion. The highly moisturizing and long-lasting creamy formula enhances the skin tone and refines pores leaving the skin glowing, flawless and radiant. Perfect for a smooth base for your foundation, or worn alone for a subtle effect. Plus, shield skin from damaging UV rays with SPF 15 protection.

products.name: Big Apple Sun Cream SPF 50
products.description: This calming sun cream from New York-inspired brand IPKN has a color correcting base that helps conceal the appearance of redness while creating a smooth canvas for makeup application. Infused with apple water extract and natural herbal extracts such as rosemary, lavender, basil and thyme. The hero ingredient is highly concentrated apple water extract, which keeps skin calm and soothed for overall smoother skin, while crystals pop with a fresh light apple scent. This multi-tasking sunscreen also minimizes the appearance of pores and helps reduce sebum production. The moisturizing SPF 50+ formula is well-regarded for its smoothing, color correcting, and all-day sun protection benefits.

products.name: Vitamin C Glow Powder Cleanser
products.description: Glow brighter with this waterless vitamin C powder cleanser! Gentle enough for daily use, this unique formula transforms from a powder into a creamy cleanser as soon as you add water. Papaya enzymes activate on contact to gently dissolve dead skin and give skin a softer, smoother feel and a “glass skin” appearance. Vitamin C in the form of pure ascorbic acid helps illuminate dull skin so the entire complexion glows after use. Due to the powder form, this vitamin C won’t oxidize as quickly as serum forms can. Works well with all skin types.

products.name: Vitamin C Glow Mask
products.description: Purify your pores and give your skin a brightening boost with this Vitamin C Glow Mask. Infused with brightening vitamin C, this mask works to soften the look of dark spots while balancing oil production. Vitamin C is rich in antioxidants, it helps aid in skin’s regeneration for a smoother, glowier complexion. Detoxifying kaolin and bentonite clays work together to minimize the look of pores and absorb excess oil. Lightweight hydrators, like sodium hyaluronate, prevent dryness and keep skin soft, moisturized and supple.

products.name: Tea Tree Serum
products.description: Bring skin back to a more balanced, smooth state with this lightweight serum from Benton. The star ingredient is 80% tea tree extract, to help calm & cool the skin and reduce oil production. Tea tree is also hydrating, helping to banish greasiness while helping retain moisture more effectively. Betaine, derived from sugar beets, is an amino acid naturally found in the body that helps keep skin hydrated and balanced. Great for oily skin types as well as combination or normal skin types who experience increased sebum production. Tea tree is also known to be helpful to treat and calm acne, due to its antimicrobial and anti-inflammatory properties. Rounding out the Tea Tree Serum is dipotassium glycyrrhizate, derived from licorice root, to help brighten and support a healthier skin barrier.

products.name: Licorice Loves Exclusive Duo Set
products.description: With no added fragrance or potentially irritating ingredients, this Soko Glam exclusive is perfect for all skin types and is the ultimate antidote to dryness, dullness and sensitivity. This set includes: Licorice pH Balancing Cleansing Toner : 10.1 fl. Oz./ 300 ml, Licorice pH Balancing Intensive Eye Cream : 1 oz / 30 ml.

products.name: You Haven’t Aged A Day Treatment Duo
products.description: $51 value! The fountain of youth has been found in this treatment duo! Diminish age spots, improve the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and elicit a youthful glow with these two potent essentials that will keep aging at bay.

products.name: Soothe & Scrub Treatment Set
products.description: All-around skin care for the body, lips and hair! Exfoliate and nourish delicate skin on lips, soothe and pamper sensitive or inflamed skin on face and body, then deeply moisturize dry strands to help prevent damage, breakage or split ends.

products.name: Maskne Treatment Duo
products.description: Alleviate and banish maskne with this powerful acne-fighting treatment duo! This powerful combination of microneedle patches and an herbal mask works together to tackle clogged pores, oil overproduction and inflammation resulting in healthy, clear skin.

products.name: 100% Organic Golden Jojoba Oil
products.description: A true multi-tasker, this GMO-free, 100% Organic Golden Jojoba Oil will give you an all-natural glow from head to toe. Jojoba nourishes and moisturizes your skin, hair, and nails with just a few drops. Known as a powerful natural moisturizer, this miracle oil also smooths wrinkles, fights free radical damage, soothes skin and can also be used as a cuticle conditioner, or even to soothe a dry scalp. Golden jojoba oil also has anti-inflammatory properties that help to alleviate irritation like chafing and chapping, reduce redness, and overall keep skin calm and comfortable. Fatty acids plus Vitamin E and B-complex vitamins in the jojoba oil help repair and strengthen the skin over time.

products.name: Pure Pearlsation pH Balancing Quick Cleansing Pad
products.description: Even the most stubborn of makeup comes off in a breeze with these large-sized, essence-soaked cleansing pads from Klavuu. Skin will look visibly brighter due to Korean pearl extract (1,000ppm) paired with 6 kinds of natural plant extracts in the Herbal Complex, and 5 kinds of ocean-derived extracts in the Marine Complex make this essence both effective and soothing. These pads will leave skin refreshed, cleansed and healthy while replenishing moisture and balancing skin’s pH.

products.name: Flower Lab Essence Sheet Mask (Camellia)
products.description: Winner of the Allure 2019 Best of Beauty Award! Infused with camellia extract, this sheet mask will help deliver moisture deep into the skin barrier for a smoother, healthier appearance. Rich in fatty acids, this floral ingredient also addresses anti-aging concerns by firming the skin and improving elasticity. The sheet mask is made of eucalyptus pulp, providing a comfortable fit in addition to added soothing benefits of eucalyptus itself.

products.name: Lip Sleeping Mask in Plum Blossom
products.description: A replenishing lip mask (and daytime glossy balm) that gently exfoliates and moisturizes delicate lips. Infused with antioxidant-rich plum blossom extract and super-hydrating muru muru butter, this lip mask provides a satin finish (not sticky!) to lock in moisture. Natural AHA’s gently exfoliate, to leave lips smooth, soft and primed. Wear it overnight as a mask for noticeably softer lips in the morning, or keep it in your bag for on-the-go application.

products.name: Micro Deep Cleansing Oil Tissue
products.description: Keep your cleanse easy and quick with these ultra-nourishing and purifying cleansing oil tissues from Mamonde. With a low pH formulation, the inclusion of olive oil (along with a blend of other natural oils) helps to nourish and hydrate skin, while self-purifying and antioxidant-rich lotus flower extract helps to balance and restore a healthy texture to the complexion. It’s formula is also anti-pollution, as it helps to combat free radical damage. Perfect for a first step to remove makeup, oils and excess sebum, skin is left feeling dewy, hydrated and refreshed.

products.name: Pore Clarifying Toner 10% Glycolic Acid
products.description: Take control of your skin care journey with this incredibly effective (yet super gentle!) pore clarifying toner. With a potent blend of 10% glycolic acid - which is another form of AHA - it will help exfoliate the skin to ultimately improve the look and texture of your skin and help encourage better cell turnover and reduced sebum production. This glycolic acid toner is also formulated with Saturday Skin’s Pore Control Complex, a blend of tea tree oil, witch hazel and antioxidant-rich red clover, and their patented Cha-7 es Complex™ to help skin naturally renew itself quicker, you will see tangible results from this toner. Sodium PCA is also a main ingredient, which helps to support skin’s natural moisture factor (NMF) to better retain hydration to keep skin plump, glowy and bouncy.

products.name: Rice Pure Gel and Cream
products.description: Get the best of both worlds to soothe, strengthen and hydrate skin with the Rice Pure Gel and Cream. Calm irritated, stressed skin with the refreshing gel, infused with soothing green tea extract and summer snowflake bulb extract. The hydrating cream is formulated with antioxidant-rich mung bean extract paired with nourishing rice extract and moisturizing fig extract. This unique formula can be customized to your specific skin needs, so you can use one or both formulas together to keep skin bright and healthy. Especially great for dry and sensitive skin types.

products.name: Green Pearlsation PHA Calming Toner
products.description: Softer, more hydrated skin is at your fingertips with this calming toner that mildly - but effectively - exfoliates and revives dry and dull skin. Formulated with PHA (gluconolactone) to mildly and gently remove dead skin cells on the surface of the skin to refine pores and improve cell turnover, giving you the glow you’re looking for.

products.name: Probiotics Double Action Serum
products.description: A prebiotic & probiotic-packed dual serum to deliver firmer, stronger, more radiant skin. Known for their innovative formulations, Neogen has created this two-pump, anti-aging serum duo to improve the natural skin barrier function and restore the skin’s pH levels for a hydrated, healthy appearance.

products.name: Fundamental Water Gel Cream
products.description: Deeply hydrate and strengthen parched skin with this water-based moisturizer that has an extremely lightweight texture with a refreshing, light finish. 63.7% Jeju green tea water effectively calms skin quickly, while antioxidants help to combat against free radical damage, to help keep skin supple and youthful. Rounding out the formulation are amino acids and panthenol (vitamin B5) to keep skin smooth and super-hydrated for a bouncy, soft appearance.

products.name: Fermentation Mask Pack
products.description: This premium mask pack from Benton contains three high-grade fermentation ingredients (Galactomyces Ferment Filtrate, Bifida Ferment Lysate and Lactobacillus/Collagen Ferment Filtrate) in the essence to provide elasticity, glow and nourishment. Why do we love fermented ingredients? Fermentation aids in the absorption of active ingredients more effectively into the skin, giving you real results after usage.

products.name: Repair Serum
products.description: Restore your complexion with this luxurious, silky serum enriched with traditional Korean herbal ingredients (‘hanbang’) such as ginseng, licorice root and matsutake mushroom. Snail mucin filtrate is the star ingredient, to even skin tone, reduce hyperpigmentation & scarring, as well as improve cell turnover to give your skin a healthy, even glow. Antioxidant-rich ginseng root water supports circulation to help plump up areas with fine lines and wrinkles. In fact, ginseng is widely regarded as a superfood and known for its healing properties.

products.name: Fundamental Nourishing Eye Butter
products.description: This moisturizing eye cream contains sunflower seed oil rich in vitamin A and vitamin E to protect the thin skin around your eyes and while a combination of four high-performance peptides improves fine lines and wrinkles. Sunflower seed oil adds additional nourishment to the sensitive under eye area, plus antioxidant-rich green tea, anti-inflammatories like cinnamon bark and caffeine to de-puff. The soft butter-like texture quickly absorbs into the skin.

products.name: MadeCera Cream Double Essence Toner
products.description: Exclusive to Soko Glam!

products.name: Bergamot Hand Wash
products.description: It’s time to give your hand wash an upgrade! Formulated with skin care in mind, the Bergamot Hand Wash is a luxurious experience. Keep hands healthy and the skin barrier strong with amino acids. Coconut-derived surfactants hydrate and nourish skin, while soapbark extract soothes and calms irritated, dry skin. Bergamot oil is rich in antioxidants due to its high concentration of limonene. Oils from sandalwood, manadrin orange, and geranium round out this signature-scented hand wash from Son Reve.

products.name: AC Clear Magic Cica Cream
products.description: Repair inflamed, acne-prone skin effectively and gently with the AC Clear Magic Cica Cream. Patented ingredient Inflax™ provides relief to irritated acne-affected skin and works as a powerful antioxidant, while Natural Protector™ provides soothing and revitalizing effects thanks to its acne-fighting properties. 55% centella asiatica (cica) extract and green tea powder calm inflammation upon application, while murumuru seed butter deeply moisturizes skin, helping to soothe even the most sensitive or irritated skin barrier. A favorite from our sampling program, this curation was a community request!

products.name: 62% Alcohol Hand Clean Sanitizing Gel
products.description: Effective and calming hand sanitizer formulated with 62% ethanol alcohol to kill 99% of germs and bacteria. This gel sanitizer also contains green tea, which is high in antioxidants and an anti-inflammatory, as well as aloe vera to calm and soothe dry, inflamed skin. Sodium hyaluronate helps draw in moisture to the skin to keep flakiness at bay. This large-sized (500 mL) pump is perfect to keep in any high traffic areas of your home. Formula is cruelty-free. pH level of 5.8~7.8.

products.name: Wonder Hair Oil
products.description: Nourish and hydrate damaged, dry, and dull hair with this luxurious, professional-grade oil. This product is made with squalane, derived from plants, to prevent essential moisture from evaporating as well as avocado oil and argan oil to soften strands and add shine. Vitamin E helps support a healthy, hydrated scalp. Use the Wonder Hair Oil to help maintain an optimal balance of keratin (the protein that hair is made up of) to keep locks strong, smooth and shiny.

products.name: Wonder Balm
products.description: Packed with ceramides and amino acids, this multi-use hair balm is great to revive and hydrate damaged, weak strands. Protect hair from damage and breakage that comes from daily styling. This balm is additionally formulated with macadamia oil, silk protein and aloe extract to deeply nourish and soften locks. Cetearyl alcohol is a long-chain fatty alcohol, which is different from drying alcohols -- this type actually helps to hydrate and smooth the hair. This product works as both a rinse-out treatment on wet hair after shampooing, or as a hair butter applied while drying hair to help smooth and de-frizz all day long.

products.name: 61.5% Alcohol Derma MasterLab Hand Spray
products.description: Eliminate bacteria and germs with this effective sanitizing hand spray. Formulated with 61.5% ethanol alcohol to kill germs, it is also infused with centella asiatica to calm and soothe inflamed, irritated skin. This spray absorbs quickly and will not leave behind a tacky residue or greasy feel. You can also use it not only on hands and skin, but other surfaces or areas that you would like to sanitize.

products.name: 62% Alcohol Aloe Chok Chok Hand Sanitizing Gel
products.description: Formulated with aloe leaf water to soothe and hydrate irritated, dry skin - plus witch hazel to calm inflammation - this hand sanitizing gel effectively eliminates 99% of harmful bacteria and germs. Containing 62% ethanol alcohol, it absorbs quickly and will not leave behind a tacky residue or greasy feel.

products.name: Inward Agas ACue Cream
products.description: Made from a potent blend of traditional Korean herbs, including green tea and Korean mint (agastache rugosa), this hydrator is soothing and calming to oily, sensitive and combination skin types. With its unique and silky texture, it absorbs quickly into the skin, controls excess sebum and has been shown in clinical studies to help fight acne, leaving skin silky and soft.

products.name: Inward Agas ACue Serum
products.description: A powerhouse treatment for oily, acne-prone and combination skin types!

products.name: Staycation Essentials Set
products.description: Exclusive to Soko Glam $82 value!

products.name: Calming Clean Water
products.description: Perfect for all skin types, this low-pH micellar cleansing water dissolves and melts away makeup without disturbing skin’s delicate moisture barrier. Coconut fruit and aloe leaf juices leave skin feeling calmed, soothed and nourished. The micelle particles in the formula gently cleanses the surface of the skin, drawing out makeup residue and impurities like a magnet to leave skin primed and hydrated.

products.name: Water Wash Balm
products.description: This formula is free of artificial fragrances, parabens, sulfates, artificial colors, animal products, alcohol, mineral oil and silicones.

products.name: Inward Agas ACue Herbal Mask
products.description: This wash-off mask is a potent blend of green tea and Korean mint (agastache rugosa) for purifying congested pores, soothing breakouts, soaking up oil and calming reactive skin types.

products.name: H.D.P Photoready Tightening Charcoal Mask (5 pack)
products.description: Use this mask for a smoother, refined complexion. Using Mediheal’s “High Definition Perfection” (H.D.P) advanced solution, this mask will tighten and clarify pores in just 15 minutes, revealing tighter, supple skin. Binchotan charcoal helps to alleviate unwanted shine while cleansing pores of built-up oils. Adenosine and antioxidant-rich pomegranate help energize and invigorate the skin, while centella asiatica helps to calm any redness.

products.name: Dewytree Cica 100 Mask
products.description: This mask contains a single ingredient, 100% centella asiatica extract. Often known as cica, this extract strengthens skin’s barrier and soothes inflamed or irritated skin. High in antioxidants and vitamins, this popular K-beauty ingredient is also known to promote collagen production. The sheet mask itself is made of a blend of natural materials - eucalyptus, cotton and seaweed.

products.name: Waterfall Glacier Water Cream
products.description: A boost of hydration is at your fingertips (literally!) with this anti-aging, Alaskan glacier water cream. The unique formula delivers a cascade of mineral-rich moisture while protecting skin from free radicals and delivering optimal absorption of moisture.

products.name: Bubi Bubi Lip Ampoule
products.description: Give your lips the ultimate treat with this extremely nourishing lip ampoule from Unpa. Though you may normally think of ampoules as a treatment for only your face, this product was formulated specifically for the delicate, often dehydrated skin on your lips.

products.name: Bubble Lip Scrub
products.description: A lip scrub like you’ve never seen before! This innovative formulation takes the lip pampering experience to new heights with a unique bubbling effect. Instead of the abrasive texture of traditional lip scrubs, this lip scrub exfoliates the delicate skin on your lips with the combination of fun little bubbles and fruit extracts.

products.name: Sun Project Shimmer Sun Essence
products.description: This 3-in-1 essence defends against harmful UV rays with SPF 30. Hydrating African walnut oil seals in moisture while aloe leaf extract and hollyhock extract soothe inflammation. The smooth, lightweight formula is infused with pink micro-pearls to brighten and even out skin tone for a luminous finish.

products.name: Sun Project Water Sun Cream
products.description: This sun cream, formulated with SPF 50 to defend against harmful UV rays, targets signs of aging and keeps skin hydrated all day long with African walnut oil, inca omega oil and bamboo extracts. Aloe leaf extract, hollyhock root and patented anti-inflammatory ingredient phyto-oligo calm soothe and protect skin’s moisture barrier without leaving behind a white cast or stickiness.

products.name: Skin Pot Cleansing Balm
products.description: This gentle cleansing balm is enriched with hemp seed oil to remove all unwanted impurities while hydrating and repairing damage with naturally occurring omega-3 fatty acids. The formula works to reduce sebum production and soothe inflammation, even after the formula is rinsed off. Pomegranate fruit extract kills harmful bacteria that can clog pores and irritate skin, helping to enrich the skin’s microbiome with healthy bacteria for a thoroughly cleansed, glowing complexion.

products.name: Skin Pot Sleeping Pack
products.description: This deeply hydrating sleeping pack is formulated with hemp seed oil to soothe inflammation, target fine lines and improve skin texture – even for those prone to acne or sensitization. Hemp seed oil is rich in omega-3 fatty acids that help strengthen the skin’s barrier and protect against free radical damage.

products.name: Milk & Peel Mask
products.description: Apply a fine layer to skin after cleansing and toning, avoid the lip and eye areas. Leave on for 5 minutes. Massage the face with wet hands, using circular movements, to rinse off. Use once or twice a week.

products.name: Dear Hydration Double Capsule Essential Toner
Clean It Zero Macaron Mini Set
Gentle Face Cleaning Remover Pad
products.description: Using one side of the pad, start cleaning and removing makeup using a gentle swiping motion across your entire face then working towards your eye and lip makeup removal. To ensure a more thorough cleaning and makeup removal, use the clean reverse side of the pad to gently swipe over your entire face for any remaining makeup and impurities on the skin.

products.name: Fresh Herb Origin Toner
products.description: After cleansing, apply toner onto hands or cotton pads and pat gently onto skin.

products.name: Fresh Herb Origin Cream
products.description: After cleansing, toning and using treatment products, scoop out a small amount and gently pat into skin until fully absorbed. Follow with SPF during the day or use it as your last skincare step at night.

products.name: Licorice pH Balancing Intensive Eye Cream
Egg White Perfect Pore Cleansing Oil

Green Tea Oil Blotting Paper
products.description: Pull out a sheet from the pack and press against the shiny areas of your face periodically throughout the day to remove oil.

products.name: Zero Made Green Cleansing Balm
products.description: Massage an appropriate amount into a dry face with makeup on in a circular motion as the first step in your nighttime skin care routine. Add water to the face to emulsify the product, then rinse with water.

products.name: Bombee Moist Sun Essence SPF 50+ PA+++
products.description: Now with improved formulation and name! This suncream was previously Honey Moist Sun Essence SPF 50+PA+++.

products.name: Snail Bee Ultimate Hydrogel Eye Patch
products.description: After cleansing and toning, use the included applicator to take out two eye patches and apply one to the under area of each eye. Leave on for 10-20 minutes, and softly pat in leftover essence to absorb into skin after removal. For best results in warm weather, store the product in a refrigerator. Ensure the cap is tightly screwed on before and after use so the product does not dry out.

products.name: AC Clear Magic Gel
products.description: This targeted acne treatment gel controls breakout-causing excessive sebum and the buildup of dead skin cells to help prevent blemishes.
